name: Chomper's Adventure Creator
description:
Create your own Chomper's Adventure levels in Chomper's Adventure Creator! Place platforms and enemies to make a really cool level, then let your friends play it with the Play/Create feature! And with the Level Generator, you can unlock Costumes by completing the levels!

This game features lots of cool features, like:

  • Create your own Chomper's Adventure levels with objects from the original game!
  • Play randomly generated levels in the Level Generator!
  • Unlock Costumes by playing the Level Generator!
